–í –¥–∞–ª–µ–∫–æ–π-–¥–∞–ª–µ–∫–æ–π –¥–æ–ª–∏–Ω–µ lived a clever crab named Krab. He loved to explore the river and find new things.

One day, Krab met a small rabbit named Zay. Zay was shy and didn't know how to make friends.

Krab, being a wise crab, told Zay that friendship is like a river. It flows together and makes the journey more beautiful.

Zay listened carefully and understood that true friendship is about being there for each other, regardless of differences.

From that day on, Krab and Zay became the best of friends. They explored the river together, shared their adventures, and always supported each other.

And so, they lived happily ever after.
